content: असत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Not being or existing; तदभावे सदप्यसत् <ls>H. 3. 3</ls>; असति त्वयि <ls>Ku. 4. 12</ls>; <ls>Ms. 9. 154.</ls> {@--2@} Non-existent, unreal; आत्मनो ब्रह्मणोऽभेदमसंतं कः करिष्यति. {@--3@} Bad (<ab>opp.</ab> सत्); सदसद्व्यक्तिहेतवः <ls>R. 1. 10.</ls> {@--4@} Wicked, vile, evil; as °विचार. {@--5@} Not manifest. {@--6@} Wrong, improper, false, untrue; इति यदुक्तं तदसत् (<ab>oft.</ab> occurring in controversial works). {@--7@} Not answering its purpose. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (न्) Indra. {%--<ab>n.</ab>%} (त्) {@--1@} Non-existence, non-entity; नासदासीन्नो सदासीत् <ls>Rv. 10. 129. 1</ls>; असद्वा इदमग्र आसीत् ततो वै सदजायत <ls>Ait. Br.</ls>, <ls>Ms. 12. 118</ls>; <ls n="Ms.">1. 11</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 1.">14</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 1.">74.</ls> {@--2@} An evil, a harm. {@--3@} Untruth, falsehood. --ती An unchaste woman; असती भवति सलज्जा <ls>Pt. 1. 418.</ls>
